title: Could someone share with me the contact details of administration office?
content:
Hi, I'm an alumni (2014-2018), for some reason I'm required to get a character certificate from my previous Institute. 

I have tried to connect with the administration office with the number that was provided in google, but the given number does not exist.
 
I do not stay in bangalore, So can someone share me any kind of contact details? 

You can dm me the contact. 

Thank you.

comments.body: Hey, did u try the number on the PESU website?
Yes I have tried, but it's out of reach
Okay, I will try to get the number tomorrow. May I know which department are you?

Hey thank you. :) 
I'm from the mechanical department.

Hey, Okay so I spoke  to them. This is what they told ->

A letter has to be written to the HOD of the concerned department, explaining why the CC is required and why it wasn't collected previously. 

Depending on the HOD, an email may be sufficient.
I have DMmed u the Chairpersons number and email ID. Hope this helps.

Hey thanks a lot for helping me out man. 
Really appreciate it :)
